digitalAssetContract.condition: Digital Bitcoins are payable to bearer in blockchain Bitcoins, at any exchange provider supporting our contract in any denomination they support, or through one of our direct agents in 100 BTC increments.
Bitcoins are audited monthly by highly trusted people.

In order to obtain Bitcoins, you must purchase them from an exchange provider or receive them in trade. The issuer only accepts direct bail-in of blockchain Bitcoins from an authorized exchange provider.

In order to redeem Digital Bitcoins, you must use an exchange provider. If none are available you must make sure you trust this issuer and make sure this contract is enforceable in your jurisdiction, and make sure you are trading in a BASKET currency so that you are not entirely reliant on a single issuer. Digital Bitcoins are redeemable to exchange providers in 100 BTC increments.
Issuance and redemption will be performed at no charge.
The Issuer reserves the right to buy back all outstanding currency, thereby terminating the use of this instrument.
Bitcoins and their blockchain are solely liable to perform according to the conditions specified in this contract.

Float - the total quantity of Bitcoins is created by Satoshi Nakamoto. The quantity of Bitcoins that enter the market yearly is strictly regulated by cryptographic algorithms.
Any server operator using this contract will not issue any more digital BTC currency than he actually has in blockchain Bitcoins.
The purchase, redemption and trading of digital assets normally are done on the basis of strong privacy.
